# LifeSpent

See how much of your life has already passedâ€”by age and median life expectancy. No judgment, just math. A calm reflection on time.

Average life expectancy is not the endpoint, but a reference. Face the remaining time and make each day more conscious.

A quiet reflection on time. No judgment, just math.

If needed, you can customize the average life expectancy and population median age reference values in the input panel.
